# Preface {-}

This book presents a reproducible comprehensive report generated using Rmarkdown to turn bushmeat microbiome data into knowledge using iMAP pipeline. Chapters 1, 2, 3, 4 introduces the basics including project objective, experimental variables, analysis workflow and the iMAP pipeline. Chapters 5 through 8 present code for sequence preprocessing, processing, classfication and preliminary analysis. Chapters 9 and 10 demonstarte dataset manipulation and visualization. Chapter 11 exemplifies a data-driven hypothesis and the last four chapters are potential manuscripts. In summary, if interested you can easily reproduce the analyses decribed in this book using your own datasets and be able to publish your entire analysis in a web-based document that subsequently allows others to reproduce.
